message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper discusses a machine learning technique (Experience Replay) and proposes a novel approach (Online Contrastive Divergence with Generative Replay) to improve its performance. This falls under the broad category of machine learning, which is covered by several arXiv CS sub-categories. However, given the focus on deep reinforcement learning and the use of Restricted Boltzmann Machines, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is the most likely sub-category. Other likely sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), cs.CV (Computer Vision), and cs.CL (Computation and Language), as these are all relevant to the topic of machine learning and could potentially cover the specific techniques and applications discussed in the paper.
